description:
While Naoto and Marie are attempting to reconstruct the world, AnchoR goes off on her own to stop the Yatsukahagi`s rampage.
RyuZU, Halter, Vermouth are all fighting their own battles while hoping that the two could make a miracle happen.
Can the two geniuses stop Gennai from destroying the world that Y had created?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 終焉機動[スティール・ウェイト]
